content: Defeating Shigandang will also reward you with the Skandha of Feeling. Just like the Skandha of Form, this will come in handy later on.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Skandha of Feeling'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating Shigandang will also reward you with the Skandha of Feeling. Just like the Skandha of Form, this will come in handy later on.
